display.title: Transmission
description: &&3Redstone Dust&&r can have &&315 levels of power&&r, decreasing each block away from the &&3power source&&r.
&&3Strongly powered&&r blocks will &&dprovide full power to adjacent Redstone Dust&&r.
Both kinds of power will power adjacent &&3Repeaters&&r, &&3Comparators&&r, and &&3Functional Components&&r.
A &&3Repeater&&r can be used to &&dextend a redstone signal&&r, delaying it by 0.1 seconds. This delay can be increased with &&7[&&r&&6Right-Click&&r&&7]&&r.
&&3Redstone Dust&&r can &&dtransport power upwards&&r in a 2x1 area using top-facing &&eSlabs&&r &&dto form stairs&&r.
&&eLamps&&r can help find out &&dwhere functional components can receive power&&r.
